title: Work-Integrated Science Project-Based Instructional Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and core instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Course strengthening science education design capabilities through practitioner-linked learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can develop and implement at least three science education projects incorporating practitioner feedback
Learners can acquire at least five field problem-solving strategies through industry expert collaboration
Learners can establish educational material production and evaluation systems utilizing smartphone-based tools
Learners can derive solutions for at least three practical challenges (e.g., budget constraints, technological limitations) encountered in science education design

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
